headline.main: As Indoor Fights Smolder, Combatants in Smoking Wars Take BattleOutdoors

docs.lead_paragraph: The nation's war over cigarette smoking is being waged on a broad new front: the great outdoors. Here in this pleasant Houston suburb, an ordinance that just took effect bans smoking anywhere in the city's public park system, with violators subject to a fine of up to $500. Bellaire joins a small but rapidly growing group of communities around the country that have gone beyond restrictions on indoor smoking to limit smoking outside as well.
